'''Instructor's Feather Accessory''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Instructor]].

==Description==
The strict instructor once sharpened his own combat skills on the merciless battlefield.<br />What he teaches the students goes beyond self-defense techniques to apply in battle.<br />Moreso than attacking and defending, what he imparts to them is the skill of surviving on the front line even in the face of insurmountable odds.<br />Every move and technique he demonstrates pays homage to the veterans of wars gone by.<br />For it was their sacrifices that helped him become who he is today.
